amendment.description: To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2748 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 38.

action.text: Amendment SA 2748 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S2510-2516, S2518; text: CR S2510) To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement.
